description: This Java source file defines the AttributesWriteRequest class, which extends DeviceRequest and is responsible for performing attribute write operations on a mock Zigbee device within a testing or simulation framework. It includes methods for executing device requests and handling responses, utilizing device clusters and attribute data.

classes.name: AttributesWriteRequest
classes.description: Represents a request to write attributes to a specific endpoint and cluster of a mock Zigbee device, handling execution and response logic.

methods.name: AttributesWriteRequest
methods.description: Constructor initializing the write request with request ID, device EUI, endpoint ID, cluster ID, server flag, and attribute write data.

methods.name: executeDeviceRequest
methods.description: Executes the write attribute request on the specified device, performing attribute updates and sending a response.
